articles.author: Patrick Pester
articles.title: 'Blood moon' gallery: Stunning snaps from last night's total lunar eclipse - Live Science
articles.description: A "blood moon" hovered above parts of the globe last night. And while North America missed out, we've rounded up some of the best photographs of September 2025's total lunar eclipse.
articles.content: A lunar eclipse can give the moon a red hue, which is why it's called a "blood moon." Here it is photographed with double exposure above Jiujiang, China. (Image credit: Photo by Shen Junfeng/VCG via … [+3316 chars]
